scripts.server:setup: cd backend && python -m venv mvenv && source mvenv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.server:dev: cd backend/src && source mvenv/bin/activate && export $(cat ../.env | xargs); python manage.py runserver
scripts.server:test: cd backend/src && source mvenv/bin/activate && export $(cat ../.env | xargs); python manage.py test -v 2
scripts.server:static: cd backend/src && source mvenv/bin/activate && export $(cat ../.env | xargs); python manage.py collectstatic --noinput
scripts.setup: npm run server:setup && npm run island:setup
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run server:dev" "npm run island:dev" "npm run static:serve"
